name: Leavanny
flavorText:
Upon finding a small Pokémon, it weaves
clothing for it from leaves, using the
cutters on its arms and sticky silk.

previous.name: Swadloon
previous.flavorText:
Forests where Swadloon live have superb
foliage because the nutrients they make
from fallen leaves nourish the plant life.

next.name: Venipede
next.flavorText:
Its bite injects a potent poison, enough
to paralyze large bird Pokémon that try
to prey on it.

pokemon.name: Sewaddle
pokemon.flavorText:
Leavanny dress it in clothes they made
for it when it hatched. It hides its head
in its hood while it is sleeping.

foliage because the nutrients they make
from fallen leaves nourish the plant life.
